name: High School Bruisical (Unity Remake)
description:
This game was originally made with the XNA engine in 2009 in a gamejam, I used the art and sound assets from the original, but totally remade the code in C# / Unity.

P1 - (Arrow keys) move and jump, (P,O,I,U keys) attack, (9,0 keys) block.

P2 - (WASD keys) move and jump, (E,R,T,Y keys) attack, (3,4 keys) block.

Start - spacebar.

P1 Start - P key , P2 Start - T key.

Also works with joysticks.
